achievements.title: Manage a Project with Digital Tools
achievements.description: Completed project management course with digital tools certification.

achievements.title: IBM EYOUTH Program
achievements.description: Participated in the IBM EYOUTH Program (Dec 2025 – Jan 2026).

achievements.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner (In Progress)

achievements.title: Pixel Studio – Founder
achievements.description: Founded a game studio and led the full development of 'Fakhr Al-Suwaidi,' managing the project end-to-end from securing the deal to execution and delivery. Oversaw creative direction, technical development, and business coordination to ensure successful launch.

achievements.title: Tuwaiq Academy Student Club – Founder & President
achievements.description: Leading the Tuwaiq Academy Student Club at KSU, an umbrella student community under Tuwaiq Academy, overseeing sub-clubs including the AWS Student Club.

achievements.title: Future Technology Club – Core Contributor
achievements.description: Part of KSU's largest student tech club (highly selective membership). Held multiple roles across Innovation, PR, Media/Social, and Content. Delivered 5+ projects and contributed to 10+ initiatives, supporting the club's growth and reach.

achievements.title: KAUST Academy AI Specialization – Stage 2
achievements.description: Finished the Second stage of the Artificial Intelligence Specialization program.
